column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Wow!!! We loved our food and our server
column2: Victor!! (Thank you Victor if you see this!) I took my friend here for her birthday brunch and everything went so great
column3: I'm very happy about choosing this place. If you have dietary restrictions like not being able to eat dairy
column4: they are very accommodating which I appreciate. Even on my friend's surprise birthday brownie slice
column5: they whipped up non-dairy whipped cream for her
column6: which is going above and beyond. Anyway
column7: the food was delicious and we adored our server. Also the wall of whiskey is gorgeous too. A+ service
